Class BlackjackGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlackjackGame

  • public class BlackjackGame
extends java.lang.Object
    BlackjackGame represents a single game of Blackjack&. A game of blackjack has a deck of cards and a list of the participants in the game which includes the dealer and all the players in the game. assumptions: 1. new deck for each round 2. only use one deck of cards 3. dealer will stay at a soft 17 (soft 17 is ACE + 6) 4. cards are never reused

      payoutAll() iterates through all the players in the game to designate wins/loses/ties

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayers

        public boolean addPlayers(int newPlayers)
        addPlayers() adds new players to the game paritipant list but the players are added without any money. the amount of players added must be greater than 0
        Parameters:
        newPlayers - the amount of new players to be added to the game
        Returns:
        boolean validData is returned true if greater than 0 and less than 25

      • getParticipants

        public java.util.ArrayList<BlackjackParticipant> getParticipants()
        getParticipants() is a getter for BLackjackGame.participants
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of BlackjackParticipant reference to the participants

      • initialDealToAllParticipants

        public void initialDealToAllParticipants()
        initialDealToAllParticipants() has the dealer deal two cards to all participants including the dealer itself. If the dealer runs out of cards, a new deck is retreived.

      • hit

        public void hit(BlackjackParticipant inputParticipant)
        hit() has the dealer deal one card to the inputParticiapnt. If the dealer runs out of cards, a new deck is retreived.
        Parameters:
        inputParticipant - the participant to receive one card from the dealer

      • payoutAll

        public java.lang.String payoutAll()
        payoutAll() iterates through all the players in the game to designate wins/loses/ties
        Returns:
        a String summary of the results

      • resetForAnotherRound

        public void resetForAnotherRound()
        resetForAnotherRound() resets all the participants in a game for another round

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(int playerToRemove)
        removePlayer() removes a given player from the game
        Parameters:
        playerToRemove - indicates the player to be removed
